abilities.name: Voice of the Sands
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spiral Buzz
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.
